name: Between Death and Oblivion
description:
After death, the player goes to heaven as a sphere that guards his/her soul and keeps it alive in a temporary space. While in heaven, the player has a time limit to overcome some obstacles in order to deliver a message to his living relatives, but to do so he/she must pass a series of challenges before he/she can deliver his/her valuable message and rest peacefully in eternity.

Use WASD to move andSspace bar to jump. Use E to set a spot to which come back in time if needed. Execute this rewinding with Q. Remove the spot pressing E again if you want to remove it.
